terms_1_text: Welcome to SafeCar, a service provided by MetaSoft. By using our IoT device, mobile application, or web dashboard, you agree to these terms tailored to ensure transparency and ethical use of technology.
terms_2_text: SafeCar collects real-time telemetry from your vehicle's ECU (Engine Control Unit) solely for diagnostic and preventive maintenance purposes. We do not track your location history for advertising purposes.
terms_3_text: You are responsible for the proper installation of the OBD-II device. SafeCar provides diagnostic suggestions based on data, but final repair decisions must be validated by a certified professional.
terms_4_text: In accordance with the ACM/IEEE Software Engineering Code of Ethics, we commit to protecting your personal data. Your vehicle's health data is encrypted and will only be shared with workshops you explicitly authorize.
terms_5_text: SafeCar is an assistive tool. MetaSoft is not liable for mechanical failures not detected by the system or for accidents resulting from the misuse of the application while driving.
